name: Space Ball (itch) (ozg2)
description:
The game Space Ball is part of Projects Spaces. Learn more at projectspacesgame.wordpress.com

The game only works on Windows (64-bit) platforms. You will need to download the Zip file, extract it, and then you can run the game by executing SpaceBall.exe.

Windows might tell you that it doens't know the source of the file and thus recommands that you won't run it. You can click on 'More info' and make your own decisions - it is safe to run.
